ing: 2 tablespoons liquid amino acids (such as BraggÂ®)
1 teaspoon red curry paste (such as Thai KitchenÂ®)
n: Becky's Slow Cooker Gluten-Free Thai Chicken Curry
des: "Don't be afraid of curry! This isn't a spicy dish. This is a super yummy dish that anyone will love, whether they are gluten-free or not! Lovely served over jasmine rice. Garnish with lime, cilantro, basil, chives/scallions, and toasted cashews or peanuts. Absolutely do not skip the garnish; it makes the meal! You can make this spicy or mild, depending on your taste."
ins:
Whisk coconut milk, liquid amino acid, peanut butter, red curry powder, red curry paste, basil, red pepper flakes, and brown sugar together in crock of a slow cooker. Add onion, bell pepper, and cilantro to slow cooker; stir. Place chicken in slow cooker.
Cook on High until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 3 hours. Add snap peas, stir, and continue cooking until peas are heated through, 5 to 10 minutes more.
